name: Blitz
description: Blitz.gg is a gaming companion app offering real-time insights, analytics, and personalized advice for games like League of Legends, Valorant, and Teamfight Tactics. Its L1 powers features like subscriptions, in-game currency, Blitz Battle Rewards, and the Marketplace.

chains.description:
Blitz.gg is a gaming companion app that provides real-time insights and analytics for several popular online games like League of Legends, Valorant, and Teamfight Tactics. The app offers game-specific stats, build guides, counters, and personalized advice to improve gameplay. 

The Avalance L1 is the heart behind our subscription, in-game currency, Blitz Battle Rewards, Marketplace and more!
chains.name: BLITZ SUBNET
